# stakers/CurveStaker.vy
> vyper: `0.2.10`
> 
> 








## Events


{{< hint info >}}
**CommitOwnership**

* `owner` : address, *notIndexed*
{{< /hint >}}

{{< hint info >}}
**ApplyOwnership**

* `owner` : address, *notIndexed*
{{< /hint >}}


## Methods
